subtitle.Text: Steve: Yeah, the biggest purpose of the card was to say, "Oh, Sam is seventeen," if you look for this thing.
But there's so much... we need so much handwriting in the game, especially for just one-off characters where you don't see their handwriting more than once,
and we knew we needed a birthday card from some member of Sam's more extended family that you were never going to hear from again,
and so I was like, "OK, it could be her uncle," and as an easter egg kind of like, wink-and-nod thing...
we're fans of the Looking Glass legacy of games and Deus Ex and Dishonored,
and so I got in contact with Harvey Smith, who was the lead designer of Deus Ex, and the co-creative lead of Dishonored,
and asked if he would just write on a piece of paper, "Happy Birthday Sam from Uncle Harvey", and he just took a picture with his cell phone and...
Karla: Yeah, like 5 minutes after you asked him! It was amazing. He was just like, "Yes, I will do this immediately." It was the best.
Steve: Yeah, he took a picture with his cell phone, and it was really cool, Harvey's a great guy and I love his games and we're super honored to have his signature in the hub of the Greenbriar house.
